summary: Applies a configurable motion blur filter to batched 2‑D images (tensor of shape B×C×H×W). The filter is generated from an odd‑sized kernel rotated by a specified angle and weighted by a direction parameter; padding and interpolation options control border handling and kernel rotation.
business_intent: Enables realistic motion‑blur augmentation or preprocessing in deep‑learning pipelines, helping models become robust to motion artifacts or creating visual effects.
